title: (Request) Gamemode where if you die, you are booted from the current game.
body:
Can we stop pandering to these casual babies who think death lasts for 20-50 seconds?
Make a gamemode where when you die, you can either spectate or go join a new game.

replies.body: I like the concept, like in hardcore minecraft.
Good to see a fellow mc player here. :D
this is easily in the top 3 stupidest ideas of the past 100 years.

So like a hardcore one life thing? 
I like the idea
